TopicTitle: Tracking station vessel switch freezes game

Articles.Content:
when i open the tracking station and try to switch vessels, it just freezes the game and no matter how long i wait it dosent respond until i reopen the game, i can use [ and ] to switch just fine but i cant use the tracking station for some reason.

logs: https://docs.google.com/document/d/e/2PACX-1vRxC5_heX5rbkovXjM4JvizHv3mWdZ78BTX3g5KjuKRqYioHtG5qXiLUyOZzaDBephKiwZHCDmjRhZC/pub

That log link you’ve posted isn’t a hyperlink, can you check it again and re-post? I suspect something is causing an exception in the tracking station which then crashes the game.

What version of KSP are you using and what mods do you have installed?
I found the mod that was causing the issue, sorry to waste your time. how do i close a question?

16 hours ago, BobTheKerbal said:

I found the mod that was causing the issue, sorry to waste your time. how do i close a question?

 

Change the title to say it’s been answered, I don’t think you can close it.

Just out of curiosity/for future reference in case someone else has the same issue, which mod was responsible?
i for some reason worded it wrong i just installed different mods i still dont know what caused that issue
